author: mklement0
body:
It would be convenient if the `*-PSDrive` cmdlets also accepted drive names (`foo`) with a trailing colon (`foo:`), given that there's no ambiguity and that it's easy to accidentally include the `:`, even though it isn't part of the actual _name_.

Desired behavior
-----------------

```powershell
# Wishful thinking
Get-PSDrive foo:  #  would be the same as: Get-PSDrive foo
New-PSDrive foo:
Remove-PSDrive foo:
```

Environment data
----------------

Written as of:

```none
PowerShell Core 6.2.0-preview.1
```
title: Suggestion: make the *-PSDrive cmdlets optionally accept drive names with a trailing colon for convenience
